div.bibl: The Philippine Messenger, Vol. III, No. 1, Jan. 1936QUINTIN J. YARANON

body.p: Mr. Yaranon comes from Cagayan, Oriental Misamis, Philippines. Formerly he studied Journalism at Loyola University, Chicago, Illinois, but recently he has turned his interest towards a new career upon realizing the vital needs of his countrymen. At present, he is engaged in Legal studies.
Through experience, he has learned that by selecting his associates and by mingling with all classes of people in all walks of life, he has discovered a true education for life.
